comment.body: How're you gonna manage without an OS?
@Beelzebub: Basically this. Started on Mint as well and moved to Debian after about a year or so.

Sadly there is no good way to switch hubs, especially if you want to do it without losing any of your user information. Thankfully, there is a way to do it here: http://184.88.37.75:43110/blog.kaffie.bit/?Post:25:How+to+change+your+ZeroMe+Hub
